title: Explore Your R Librarues
text: goal libminer provide summary user’s R libraries. toy package developed workshop meant serious use.

title: Explore Your R Librarues
text: can install development version libminer GitHub :

title: Explore Your R Librarues
text: basic example shows solve common problem:
code: library(libminer)  lib_summary() #>                                          library n_packages #> 1 /home/lzeman/R/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu-library/4.3        108 #> 2     /tmp/Rtmp2yRT0J/temp_libpath3b974a1083b9ac          1 #> 3                             /usr/lib/R/library         29  ## you can also ask it to calculate sizes  lib_summary(sizes = TRUE) #>                                          library n_packages  lib_size #> 1 /home/lzeman/R/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu-library/4.3        108 219157255 #> 2     /tmp/Rtmp2yRT0J/temp_libpath3b974a1083b9ac          1     41400 #> 3                             /usr/lib/R/library         29  59321890

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
text: Provides brief summary package libraries machine.

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
text: sizes logical indicating whether calculate sizes

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
code: lib_summary() #>                           library n_packages #> 1 /home/runner/work/_temp/Library         69 #> 2      /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/library         29 #> 3 /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/site-library          1 lib_summary(sizes = TRUE) #>                           library n_packages lib_size #> 1 /home/runner/work/_temp/Library         69 71393789 #> 2      /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/library         29 69574120 #> 3 /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/site-library          1 14569622
